DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect dual probiotic strain contain Lactobacillus curvatus HY7601 Lactobacillus plantarum KY1032 triglyceride apolipoprotein A-V .
DOC.brief_title: Supplementation Dual Probiotic Strains Reduced Fasting Triglyceride Enhanced Apolipoprotein A-V Levels
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled study conduct 128 nondiabetic hypertriglyceridemic ( Plasma Triglyceride , 150-500 mg/dL ) subject . Over 12 week test period , probiotic group consume 2g powder daily contain dual probiotic strain , placebo group consume without probiotic .
DOC.criteria: nondiabetic ( plasma fasting glucose , < 126mg/dL ; 2hour plasma glucose , < 200mg/dL ) borderline moderate hypertriglyceridemia ( plasma triglyceride , 150500 mg/dL ) lipidlowering medication use medication supplement use probiotic product use past 1 month dyslipidemia diabetes mellitus hypertension liver disease renal disease cardiovascular disease cerebrovascular disease pancreatitis cancer medication alcohol abuse pregnant breast feeding
